import React,{ useState , useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const url2="http://localhost:3002/sb_pics" const Sb=()=> { const [sbpics,setSbpics]=useState( [ ] ) useEffect( ()=> { axios.get(url1).then((res)=> setExpics(res.data) ) axios.get(url2).then((res)=> setSbpics(res.data) ) },[]) return(<>
{/* LIST-GROUP */}

EXPLOSION BOXES MENU

explosion boxes
scrap books
greeting cards
popup box
wall decors
{/* LIST-GROUP */} {/* RIGHT COLUMN */}

SCRAP BOOKS

{/* EXPLOSION BOX GREETING CARDS POP UP BOXES WALL DECORS */} {/* 1st ROW */}
{ sbpics.map((e,index)=> { return(<> {/* 1st right column */}
{/* 1st column card */}
{e.name}
  • {` Size : ${e.features[0]}`}
  • {` Price : ${e.features[1]}`}
{e.buy}
{/* 1st column card */}
{/* 1st right column */} ) }) }
{/* 1st ROW */}
{/* 1st container */}
{/* RIGHT COLUMN */}
) } export default Sb
